title: Trump appoints Rodney Scott as new Customs and Border Protection chief
shortDescription: Rodney Scott was pushed out by the Biden administration in 2021 and would oversee one of America's largest law enforcement agencies.

title: Jewish Americans have harder time getting jobs, study says: What can Trump do?
shortDescription: A new study from the ADL found workplace hiring discrimination. What can Trump do in his second term to help?

title: Want a VIP invite to Trump's inauguration? That'll cost you.
shortDescription: Top donors to Trump's inaugural committee can snag invites for dinners with the president-elect and his wife, and tickets to the big event Jan. 20.

title: Trump admin's deregulation plans may harm animals
shortDescription: Donald Trump hasn’t been talking about specific animal welfare policies, but animal welfare advocates say there's cause for concern.

title: These Ohio Republicans want to replace VP-elect JD Vance in the Senate
shortDescription: Several Republicans are eager to replace Vice President-elect JD Vance in the U.S. Senate. Gov. Mike DeWine hasn't said who he's considering.

title: Fauci, Cheney, Milley: Whom could Biden preemptively pardon?
shortDescription: President Joe Biden is reportedly considering preemptive pardons to head off Trump's "retribution." Who could be on Biden's list?

title: Democrats running for DNC chair make cases at party meeting
shortDescription: Democrats presented a long list of ideas for rebuilding their party on Thursday

title: Trump to nominate former Sen. David Perdue as China ambassador
shortDescription: Trump's pick of David Perdue comes as president-elect promises new tariffs on China and to take a more aggressive approach to a geopolitical rival.

title: Bahamas 'firmly rejected' Trump deportation proposal: prime minister
shortDescription: Bahamas Prime Minister Philip Davis said the country 'firmly rejected' a Trump transition proposal to deport immigrants from other countries there.

title: Melania Trump praises Barron Trump's 2024 advisor role
shortDescription: Returning as first lady, Melania Trump said her 18-year-old only child gave his father helpful advice on reaching young voters.

title: Elon Musk gave groups backing Trump over $250 million, records show
shortDescription: The world's richest person, Elon Musk, contributed more than a quarter-billion dollars to campaign committees that helped Trump win a second term.

title: Trump selects David Sacks as White House AI and cryptocurrency 'czar'
shortDescription: Once a vocal Trump critic, David Sacks is set to join the next White House to work on topics at the forefront of tech and global economy policy debates.

title: Meet the 19 Pennsylvanians who will help make Trump president
shortDescription: Several of the Pa. electors also acted as "fake electors" in 2020, supporting a scheme to overturn Trump's election loss.

title: Daily Briefing: Shouting in the US Capitol
shortDescription: Trump assassination attempt hearing turns volatile. Here is the news to know on Friday.

title: Sentencing in Donald Trump’s hush money case postponed | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Plus: Arkansas Governor Mike Huckabee is Trump’s pick for ambassador to Israel – a big win for Christian Zionists. More top stories on The Excerpt.

title: Trump appoints former PayPal exec David Sacks as AI, crypto czar
shortDescription: Trump — who once labeled crypto a scam — embraced digital assets during his campaign, promising to make the U.S. the "crypto capital of the planet."

title: Donald Trump gets Fox Nation Patriot of the Year award
shortDescription: The Patriot Awards “honor and recognize America’s finest patriots, including military veterans, first responders and other inspirational everyday heroes.”

title: Vivek Ramaswamy, Elon Musk on Capitol Hill
shortDescription: Vivek Ramaswamy and Elon Musk, picked to run the new Department of Government Efficiency, met with lawmakers on Capitol Hill.

title: Democratic Sen. John Fetterman: Pardon Hunter Biden and Donald Trump
shortDescription: Sen. John Fetterman argued President Joe Biden’s son Hunter Biden and President-elect Donald Trump both deserve pardons after facing what he called “politically motivated” trials.

title: Republicans block bid to release results of Matt Gaetz ethics investigation
shortDescription: The U.S. House of Representatives on Thursday blocked an effort to expedite the release of an ethics probe into former Rep. Matt Gaetz.

title: Chelsea Manning, trans rights activist protest at Capitol
shortDescription: The WikiLeaks whistleblower joined a protest of GOP-led effort to ban transgender women from using women’s bathrooms in Capitol and House buildings.

title: Hearing for Trump assassination attempt erupts in heated exchange
shortDescription: Acting director of the Secret Service Ronald Rowe entered into a shouting match with GOP Rep. Pat Fallon after a line of questioning touched on 9/11.
